channel.title: Which DEOB do you like the best?
channel.description: I want to work off of a blank 317, but I want to know if there would be more than two players actuallly on the server every day. Should I do a 317? Or is everyone sick of old style RS now?

item.title: Which DEOB do you like the best?
item.dc:creator: @cam_man98 cam man98
item.description:
@cam_man98 wrote:

Thats what I was planning. I was thinking I should get the newer wepons like vesta and statius d claws god swords etc, and then I also wanted to load the newer maps. But I dont know if the maps would be pushing out of the 317 style Or adding working curses. Would the old style fans look down on curses? Or encourage them?
I think that would be the best, a 317/377 with updates on most stuff like armor, npcs and such.

Read full topic
item.source: Which DEOB do you like the best?

item.title: Which DEOB do you like the best?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

I love 317/377. I also love most of the features in the 474 revision (which is a common one, not 424 like you said in your poll), however I hate the new equips such as godswords and better equipment. I like neitiznot helmets, but I hate fighter torsos and other unfair equipments. I definitely find no problems in the 317/377 revisions though.

Read full topic
item.source: Which DEOB do you like the best?

item.title: Which DEOB do you like the best?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

Tutorial:

I go 50/50 with that. People loved the old school RS because of the lack of newer items, mainly overpowered ones. I believe if you are going to create an old school server, it should at least have bosses up to the godwars.

Thats what I was planning.
I was thinking I should get the newer wepons like vesta and statius d claws god swords etc, and then I also wanted to load the newer maps.
But I dont know if the maps would be pushing out of the 317 style
Or adding working curses.
Would the old style fans look down on curses? Or encourage them?

Read full topic
item.source: Which DEOB do you like the best?
